rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 4 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 5:21 PM, 09 June 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Bataan, Pampanga, Bulacan and Cavite within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Rizal(Binangonan, Taytay, Cainta, Angono, San Mateo, Antipolo), Metro Manila(Taguig, Pasig, Muntinlupa, Paranaque, Las Pinas, Marikina), Nueva Ecija(Carranglan), Zambales(Santa Cruz, Candelaria), Quezon(Tayabas, Lucban, Dolores, Candelaria, Sariaya, Tiaong, San Antonio), Laguna(Majayjay, Liliw, Nagcarlan, Rizal, San Pablo, Alaminos) and Batangas(Lipa, Santo Tomas, Padre Garcia, Rosario) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
